name: JetRo
description:
Aliens are invading! The army has deployed an old prototype robot as a last ditch effort to protect our planet!

A little bit of Thrust meets Missile Command with a couple of other strategic factors. This game was a short term project, which took a little over a month to create, including all the graphical assets, sound effects, and music.

After the tutorial, there are 5 total levels. See if you can get to the end and destroy the mother ship!

Thanks for playing my game!

Bug Fix: The bug in Level 4, preventing you from lifting off has been fixed.
